org.lwjgl.opencl

Class CLCapabilities

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.lwjgl.opencl.CLCapabilities

  • public class CLCapabilities
extends java.lang.Object
    Defines the capabilities of an OpenCL platform or device.

    The instance returned by CLPlatform.createCapabilities(long) )} exposes the functionality present on either the platform or any of its devices. This is unlike the CL10.CL_PLATFORM_EXTENSIONS string, which returns only platform functionality, supported across all platform devices.

    The instance returned by CLDevice.createCapabilities(long, org.lwjgl.opencl.CLCapabilities) exposes only the functionality available on that particular device.
